creator: Speedway Motorsports, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the official app of the Charlotte Motor Speedway, bringing fans closer to the action and enriching your event experience. Get all the info you need for race day and beyond, plus exclusive content, and personalized offers and experiences. This is a mobile experience to help you find what you love whether it’s event information, special access, or offers and discounts. Powered by Uphoria.

Features include:

• Event details and information
• The latest news, photos, and videos
• Personalized offers and content
• Exclusive experience and entertainment opportunities
• Live audio of the broadcast
• Fan guides
• Event schedules
• Ticket information including ability to request tickets or links to purchase
• Browse and interact with CMS Twitter and Instagram feeds right in the app
• Venue maps and directions
• Menu listing for race weekend schedule
• Submit comments to share a great experience or suggest improvements to CMS
• Much more to come in future releases!
descriptionShort: Welcome to the official app of the Charlotte Motor Speedway!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Update your Charlotte Motor Speedway app for the latest performance enhancements and bug fixes.
